get.description:
This endpoint retrieves all content (excluding obsolete content) for the current organization.

For Global Admin Tool Organizations, if the `X-Degreed-Organization-Code` header is included, then the endpoint will return content for the Tenant Organization related to the header value as long as the organization is a member of the Global Admin Tool Organization.

Required Scope

`content:read`

parameters.name: next
parameters.description: Retrieves the next batch of content.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of content items to display per page. A maximum of 1000 is allowed.

parameters.name: filter[start_date]
parameters.description: Filter criteria that returns content created from this date on. Format `yyyy-mm-dd`.

parameters.name: filter[end_date]
parameters.description: Filter criteria that returns content created before this date. Format `yyyy-mm-dd`.

parameters.name: filter[url]
parameters.description: Filter criteria that only returns content with this URL.

parameters.name: filter[internal_only]
parameters.description: Filter criteria that only returns content internal to the organization.

parameters.name: filter[include_restricted]
parameters.description: Filter criteria that only returns content restricted to administrative groups.

get.description:
This endpoint retrieves a specific content item for the current organization.

For Global Admin Tool Organizations, if the `X-Degreed-Organization-Code` header is included, then the endpoint will return content for the Tenant Organization related to the header value as long as the organization is a member of the Global Admin Tool Organization.

Required Scope

`content:read`

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the content to retrieve.

get.description:
This endpoint retrieves all books for the current organization.

For Global Admin Tool Organizations, if the `X-Degreed-Organization-Code` header is included, then the endpoint will return content for the Tenant Organization related to the header value as long as the organization is a member of the Global Admin Tool Organization.

Required Scope

`content:read`

parameters.name: next
parameters.description: Retrieves the next batch of books.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of books to display per page. A maximum of 1000 is allowed.

parameters.name: filter[start_date]
parameters.description: Filter criteria that returns content created from this date on. Format `yyyy-mm-dd`.

parameters.name: filter[end_date]
parameters.description: Filter criteria that returns content created before this date. Format `yyyy-mm-dd`.

parameters.name: filter[external_id]
parameters.description: Filter criteria that only returns books with this external ID.

parameters.name: filter[internal_only]
parameters.description: Filter criteria that only returns books internal to the organization.

post.description:
This endpoint creates a new book in the system.

For Global Admin Tool Organizations, if the `X-Degreed-Organization-Code` header is included, then the endpoint will create content for the Tenant Organization related to the header value as long as the organization is a member of the Global Admin Tool Organization.

Required Scope

`content:write`

parameters.name: title
parameters.description: The title of the book.

parameters.name: subtitle
parameters.description: The subtitle of the book.

parameters.name: authors
parameters.description: Comma delimited list of authors.

parameters.name: pages
parameters.description: Number of pages.

parameters.name: summary
parameters.description: Short summary of the book.

parameters.name: image-url
parameters.description: Cover image of the book.

parameters.name: obsolete
parameters.description: If the book should be marked as obsolete.

parameters.name: publish-date
parameters.description: Date that the book was published.

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: Language of the book.

parameters.name: external-id
parameters.description: External ID of the book. This is usually the URL where the book can be found.

parameters.name: i-s-b-n13
parameters.description: ISBN13 number of the book.

get.description:
This endpoint retrieves a specific book for the current organization.

For Global Admin Tool Organizations, if the content belongs to a Tenant Organization, then the `X-Degreed-Organization-Code` header must be provided.

Required Scope

`content:read`

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the book to retrieve.

delete.description:
This endpoint marks a book as obsolete from the Degreed catalog. On a successful delete, it returns a `204 No Content` response.

For Global Admin Tool Organizations, if the content belongs to a Tenant Organization, then the `X-Degreed-Organization-Code` header must be provided.

Required Scope

`content:write`

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the book to delete.

patch.description:
This endpoint updates the supplied fields for a specific book.

The `PATCH` request does not support the `X-Degreed-Organization-Code` header.

Required Scope

`content:write`

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the book to update.

parameters.name: title
parameters.description: The title of the book.

parameters.name: subtitle
parameters.description: The subtitle of the book.

parameters.name: authors
parameters.description: Comma delimited list of authors.

parameters.name: pages
parameters.description: Number of pages.

parameters.name: summary
parameters.description: Short summary of the book.

parameters.name: image-url
parameters.description: Cover image of the book.

parameters.name: obsolete
parameters.description: If the book should be marked as obsolete.

parameters.name: publish-date
parameters.description: The date that the book was published.

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: The language of the book.

parameters.name: external-id
parameters.description: External ID of the book. This is usually the URL where the book can be found.

parameters.name: i-s-b-n13
parameters.description: The ISBN13 number of the book.

parameters.name: organization-id
parameters.description: The ID of the organization.

parameters.name: provider-code
parameters.description: Unique provider code.

parameters.name: provider-id
parameters.description: The ID of the provider.

get.description:
This endpoint retrieves all articles for the current organization.

For Global Admin Tool Organizations, if the `X-Degreed-Organization-Code` header is included, then the endpoint will return content for the Tenant Organization related to the header value as long as the organization is a member of the Global Admin Tool Organization.

Required Scope

`content:read`

This endpoint retrieves all videos for the current organization.

For Global Admin Tool Organizations, if the `X-Degreed-Organization-Code` header is included, then the endpoint will return content for the Tenant Organization related to the header value as long as the organization is a member of the Global Admin Tool Organization.

Required Scope

`content:read`

parameters.name: next
parameters.description: Retrieves the next batch of videos.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of videos to display per page. A maximum of 1000 is allowed.

parameters.name: filter[start_date]
parameters.description: Filter criteria that returns videos created from this date on. Format `yyyy-mm-dd`.

parameters.name: filter[end_date]
parameters.description: Filter criteria that returns videos created before this date. Format `yyyy-mm-dd`.

parameters.name: filter[external-id]
parameters.description: Filter criteria that only returns videos with this external ID.

parameters.name: filter[internal_only]
parameters.description: Filter criteria that only returns videos internal to the organization.

parameters.name: filter[include_restricted]
parameters.description: Filter criteria that only returns content restricted to administrative groups.

post.description:
This endpoint creates a new video in the system and optionally creates visibilty group relationships.

For Global Admin Tool Organizations, if the `X-Degreed-Organization-Code` header is included, then the endpoint will create content for the Tenant Organization related to the header value as long as the organization is a member of the Global Admin Tool Organization.

**Note:** When visibility groups are set for content, the groups must either be (a) all of privacy level `Administrative` or (b) all of a non- `Administrative` privacy level. Non- `Administrative` privacy levels include `Open`, `Closed` and `Private`. Content in `Administrative` groups is only visible to users in the `Administrative` groups. If the content is not associated with any Administrative groups, the content is visible to all users in the organization. A group's privacy level can be retrived from the [Get a Specific Group]() endpoint.

Required Scope

`content:write`

parameters.name: title
parameters.description: The title of the video.

parameters.name: external-id
parameters.description: The external ID of the video.

parameters.name: summary
parameters.description: Short summary of the video.

parameters.name: url
parameters.description: URL location where more information can be found.

parameters.name: obsolete
parameters.description: If the video should be marked as obsolete.

parameters.name: image-url
parameters.description: Cover image of the video.

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: Spoken language of the video.

parameters.name: duration
parameters.description: Length of the video. Type is supplied with `duration-type`.

parameters.name: duration-type
parameters.description: Seconds, minutes, hours, or days.

parameters.name: publish-date
parameters.description: Date that the video was published.

parameters.name: visibility-groups
parameters.description: The relationship `id` of the relationship object must be the id of the visibility group and the type of the relationship must be `groups`.

get.description:
This endpoint retrieves a specific video for the current organization.

For Global Admin Tool Organizations, if the content belongs to a Tenant Organization, then the `X-Degreed-Organization-Code` header must be provided.

Required Scope

`content:read`

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the video to retrieve.

delete.description:
This endpoint marks a video as obsolete from the Degreed catalog. On a successful delete, it returns a `204 No Content` response.

For Global Admin Tool Organizations, if the content belongs to a Tenant Organization, then the `X-Degreed-Organization-Code` header must be provided.

Required Scope

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the video to delete.

patch.description:
This endpoint updates supplied fields for a specific video. The `PATCH` request does not support the `X-Degreed-Organization-Code` header.

Required Scope

`content:write`

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the video to update.

parameters.name: title
parameters.description: The title of the video.

parameters.name: summary
parameters.description: Short summary of the video.

parameters.name: url
parameters.description: URL location where more information can be found.

parameters.name: obsolete
parameters.description: If the video should be marked as obsolete.

parameters.name: image-url
parameters.description: Cover image of the video.

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: Spoken language of the video.

parameters.name: duration
parameters.description: Length of the video. Type is supplied with `duration-type`.

parameters.name: duration-type
parameters.description: Seconds, minutes, hours, or days.

parameters.name: publish-date
parameters.description: Date that the video was published.

get.description:
This endpoint retrieves all courses for the current organization.

For Global Admin Tool Organizations, if the `X-Degreed-Organization-Code` header is included, then the endpoint will return content for the Tenant Organization related to the header value as long as the organization is a member of the Global Admin Tool Organization.

Required Scope

`content:read`

parameters.name: next
parameters.description: Retrieves the next batch of courses.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of courses to display per page. A maximum of 1000 is allowed.

parameters.name: filter[start_date]
parameters.description: Filter criteria that returns content created from this date on. Format `yyyy-mm-dd`.

parameters.name: filter[end_date]
parameters.description: Filter criteria that returns content created before this date. Format `yyyy-mm-dd`.

parameters.name: filter[external-id]
parameters.description: Filter criteria that only returns courses with this external ID.

parameters.name: filter[internal_only]
parameters.description: Filter criteria that only returns courses internal to the organization.

parameters.name: filter[include_restricted]
parameters.description: Filter criteria that only returns content restricted to administrative groups.

post.description:
This endpoint creates a new course in the system and optionally creates visibilty group relationships.

For Global Admin Tool Organizations, if the `X-Degreed-Organization-Code` header is included, then the endpoint will create content for the Tenant Organization related to the header value as long as the organization is a member of the Global Admin Tool Organization.

**Note:** When visibility groups are set for content, the groups must either be (a) all of privacy level `Administrative` or (b) all of a non- `Administrative` privacy level. Non- `Administrative` privacy levels include `Open`, `Closed` and `Private`. Content in `Administrative` groups is only visible to users in the `Administrative` groups. If the content is not associated with any Administrative groups, the content is visible to all users in the organization. A group's privacy level can be retrived from the [Get a Specific Group]() endpoint.

Required Scope

`content:write`

parameters.name: title
parameters.description: The title of the course.

parameters.name: external-id
parameters.description: The external ID of the course.

parameters.name: organization-id
parameters.description: The ID of the organization.

parameters.name: provider-code
parameters.description: Unique provider code.

parameters.name: provider-id
parameters.description: The ID of the provider.

parameters.name: summary
parameters.description: Short summary of the course.

parameters.name: url
parameters.description: URL location where more information can be found.

parameters.name: obsolete
parameters.description: If the course should be marked as obsolete.

parameters.name: image-url
parameters.description: Cover image of the course.

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: Spoken language of the course.

parameters.name: duration
parameters.description: Length of the course. Type is supplied with `duration-type`.

parameters.name: duration-type
parameters.description: Seconds, minutes, hours, or days.

parameters.name: cost-units
parameters.description: Units for the cost.

parameters.name: cost-unit-type
parameters.description: The cost unit type can be any currency

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: Format of the course. Possible values include `Virtual Classroom`, `Accredited`, `Instructor Led Training`, and `Online`.

parameters.name: difficulty
parameters.description: Describes the difficulty level of the course.

parameters.name: video-url
parameters.description: If the course has a video, supply the URL where the video can be accessed.

parameters.name: visibility-groups
parameters.description: The relationship `id` of the relationship object must be the id of the visibility group and the type of the relationship must be `groups`.

get.description:
This endpoint retrieves all skills for a specific content item.

Required Scope

`content:read`

parameters.name: contentId
parameters.description: The ID of the content to retrieve.

parameters.name: next
parameters.description: Retrieves the next batch of content.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of content items to display per page. A maximum of 1000 is allowed.

post.description:
This endpoint adds one or more skills to existing content. On a successful add, it returns a `201 Created` response.

Required Scope

`content:write`

parameters.name: contentId
parameters.description: The ID of the content to add skills to.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: String containing the name of the skill. The name is also the unique identifier.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Type of object that will be added as a relationship. Use `skills`.

delete.description:
This endpoint deletes the specified skills in content. On a successful delete, it returns a `204 No Content` response.

Required Scope

`content:write`

parameters.name: contentId
parameters.description: The ID of the content to delete skills from.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: String containing the name of the skill. The name is also the unique identifier.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Type of object that will be deleted as a relationship. Use `skills`.

patch.description:
This endpoint replaces all skills in existing content with the newly supplied skills. On a successful add, it returns a `201 Created` response.

Required Scope

`content:write`

parameters.name: contentId
parameters.description: The ID of the content to add replace skills in.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: String containing the name of the skill. The name is also the unique identifier.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Type of object that will be added as a relationship. Use `skills`.

get.description:
This endpoint retrieves visibility groups for a specific content item.

Required Scope

`content:read`

parameters.name: contentId
parameters.description: The ID of the content for which the visibility groups will be retrieved. The content type may be `Articles`, `Assessments`, `Courses`, `Events`, `Podcasts` or `Videos`.

patch.description:
This endpoint replaces all content's visibility groups. On a successful replacement, it returns a `201 Created` response. If the patch is set with an empty list, the content will not be shared in any groups.

**Note:** When visibility groups are set for content, the groups must either be (a) all of privacy level `Administrative` or (b) all of a non- `Administrative` privacy level. Non- `Administrative` privacy levels include `Open`, `Closed` and `Private`. Content in `Administrative` groups is only visible to users in the `Administrative` groups. If the content has one or more `Administrative` visibility groups set, and you send the body with an empty list of groups, the content will be visible to any users in the organization. A group's privacy level can be retrived from the [Get a Specific Group]() endpoint.

Required Scope

`content:write`

parameters.name: contentId
parameters.description: The ID of the content for which the visibility groups will be replaced. The content type can be `Articles`, `Assessments`, `Courses`, `Events`, `Podcasts` or `Videos`.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the visibility group that will replace any existing visibility groups for the content.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Type of object that will be added as a relationship. Can only be `groups`.

owner.description: `owner` is usually the author of an article.
